results.title: Spy hard
results.creator_credit: Rick Friedberg, Doug Draizin, Jeffrey Konvitz and Hollywood Pictures
results.brief_description: Special Agent Dick Steele (Leslie Nielsen) aka Agent WD-40, is brought out of retirement to save the world from destruction and annihilation by the hands of the notorious General Rancor (Andy Griffith) who has a hidden missile at a secret base. Agent WD-40 teams up with KGB Agent Veronique Ukrinsky (Nicollette Sheridan) aka Agent 3.14, to find her kidnapped scientist father who as it turns out holds the key to foiling Rancor’s evil plan in the form of a special computer chip. Cast also includes Charles Durning, Marcia Gay Harden, Barry Bostwick.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Rick Friedberg, Doug Draizin, Jeffrey Konvitz and Hollywood Pictures

results.title: The Three musketeers
results.creator_credit: Stephen Herek, Joe Roth, Roger Birnbaum and Walt Disney Pictures
results.brief_description: This Disney adaptation of the classic 17th century French novel by Alexandre Dumas features Chris O’Donnell in the lead role of the swashbuckling hero D’Artagnan, a musketeer in the King’s guards in Paris. When D’Artagnan discovers that the scheming Cardinal Richelieu (Tim Curry) is plotting to oust the King from his throne, he joins up with three other musketeers - Athos (Kiefer Sutherland), Porthos (Oliver Platt), and Aramis (Charlie Sheen) - to protect King and country and thwart the unscrupulous Cardinal’s plans. Also stars Rebeccca De Mornay as Milady de Winter. Beautiful cinematography by Dean Semler and lavish costuming and set design.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Stephen Herek, Joe Roth, Roger Birnbaum and Walt Disney Pictures

results.title: While you were sleeping
results.creator_credit: Jon Turteltaub, Joe Roth, Roger Birnbaum and Hollywood Pictures
results.brief_description: Lucy (Sandra Bullock), a young subway ticket collector spends her days fantasising about one of her regular commuters, Peter (Peter Gallagher). One day fate intervenes when Lucy witnesses Peter being mugged at the station and tossed on to the tracks. Saving him from near death, Lucy gets Peter to hospital where through a misunderstanding his family assume that Lucy is Peter’s fiancee. However the plot takes a further turn when Lucy finds herself attracted to Peter’s brother Jack (Bill Pullman). A charming romantic screwball comedy. Cast also includes Peter Boyle, Glynis Johns, Micole Mercurio, Jack Warden.

results.title: When a man loves a woman
results.creator_credit: Luis Mandoki, Jon Avnet, Jordan Kerner and Touchstone Pictures
results.brief_description: Family and marriage are put under threat when Alice’s (Meg Ryan) drinking becomes an addiction. Husband Michael (Andy Garcia), an airline pilot, is a perfectionist and finds it increasingly difficult to control his often reckless and neglectful wife. It takes an accident before Alice realises she has hit rock bottom and needs help. After attending a rehab clinic Alice finally returns home stronger, more independent and alcohol free but Michael, on the other hand, has problems adjusting to the new Alice. He prefers the needy and dependent wife. As the marriage begins to break down, Michael and Alice take the long and difficult road to recovery through counselling. Cast also includes Lauren Tom, Philip Seymour Hoffman, Tina Majorino, Mae Whitman, Ellen Burstyn.

results.title: Three men and a baby
results.creator_credit: Leonard Nimoy, Robert W. Cort, Ted Field and Touchstone Pictures
results.brief_description: Entertaining light-hearted comedy about three bachelors living in a New York apartment whose lives are suddenly and dramatically changed when a baby is left on their doorstep. The three are somewhat challenged in their new role of parenthood and it is the interaction between them that provides most of the humour. Stars Tom Selleck, Steve Guttenberg and Ted Danson in the lead roles with Nancy Travis, Margaret Colin and Celeste Holm.

results.title: Enemy of the State
results.creator_credit: Tony Scott, Jerry Bruckheimer, Scott Free Productions and Touchstone Pictures
results.brief_description: In this action thriller from director Tony Scott, Will Smith plays Robert Clayton Dean, an innocent everyman who gets caught up in espionage, murder and government corruption. When Robert is handed a tape with damning evidence, he discovers there is no hiding from the insidious technology that tracks his every move. Robert seeks the aid of former covert operative Brill - Gene Hackman in a role that references his iconic Harry Caul from key 1970s paranoid thriller “The Conversation”. Cast also includes Jon Voight, Gabriel Byrne, Jason Robards.

results.title: Blank check
results.creator_credit: Rupert Wainwright, Craig Baumgarten, Gary Adelson and Walt Disney Productions
results.brief_description: When 11-year-old Preston Waters’ bicycle is hit by a crook on the run, a hastily scrawled blank cheque sets the wheels in motion for the spending spree of a lifetime. Cast includes Brian Bonsall, Karen Duffy, Miguel Ferrer.

results.title: The Rolling Stones rewind
results.creator_credit: Julien Temple, Paul Spencer, Nitrate Films and Vestron Musicvideo
results.brief_description: Mick Jagger and Bill Wyman take us through this selection of Rolling Stones classic hits in their own offbeat quirky way interspersed with interviews, concerts, opinions and newsreel footage. Also includes some memorable moments of interviews by Australia’s very own Norman Gunston (Garry McDonald) and some uncut uncensored versions of “She was hot”, “Too much blood” and “Undercover of the night”. Contains some b&w scenes.

results.title: Sailor beware = Panic in the parlour
results.creator_credit: Gordon Parry, Jack Clayton, British Lion Films and Romulus Films
results.brief_description: From the stage play “Sailor beware” by Philip King and Falkland L. Cary with an introduction by Bill Collins. A humorous tale of domestic conflict between Shirley (Shirley Eaton), her prospective sailor husband-to-be Albert (Ronald Lewis) and Shirley’s overbearing acerbic tongued mother, Emma (Peggy Mount). Cast includes Cyril Smith, Esme Cannon, Gordon jackson, Geoffrey Keen, Joy Webster, Thora Hird.

results.title: Rosalie
results.creator_credit: W S. Van Dyke, William Anthony McGuire and Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer
results.brief_description: A rich and lively blend of great songs, great dances, great comedy and plain old period charm, Rosalie is the kind of zany musical they just don’t make anymore. Starring Nelson Eddy as Dick Thorpe, star footballer and West Point cadet and Eleanor Powell as Rosalie, the woman he loves. Cast also includes Frank Morgan, Edna May Oliver, Ray Bolger, Ilona Massey with words and music by Cole Porter. Based on the play by William Anthony McGuire and Guy Bolton. The film is introduced by Bill Collins.
